021import net.tnemc.bukkit.command.AdminCommand;
022import net.tnemc.bukkit.command.ModuleCommand;
023import net.tnemc.bukkit.command.MoneyCommand;
024import net.tnemc.bukkit.command.ShortCommands;
025import net.tnemc.bukkit.command.TransactionCommand;
026import net.tnemc.bukkit.depend.faction.FactionHandler;
027import net.tnemc.bukkit.depend.towny.TownyHandler;
028import net.tnemc.core.TNECore;
029import net.tnemc.core.api.callback.TNECallbacks;
030import net.tnemc.menu.bukkit.BukkitMenuHandler;
031import net.tnemc.plugincore.PluginCore;
032import net.tnemc.plugincore.core.api.CallbackManager;
033import org.bukkit.Bukkit;
034import org.bukkit.plugin.java.JavaPlugin;
035import revxrsal.commands.bukkit.BukkitLamp;
036import revxrsal.commands.command.CommandActor;
037import revxrsal.commands.command.ExecutableCommand;
038
039/**
040 * BukkitCore
041 *
042 * @author creatorfromhell
043 * @since 0.1.2.0
044 */
045public class BukkitCore extends TNECore {
046
047  private final JavaPlugin plugin;
048
049  private BukkitConfig bukkitConfig;
050
051  public BukkitCore(final JavaPlugin plugin) {
052
053    this.plugin = plugin;
054  }
055
056  public static BukkitCore instance() {
057
058    return (BukkitCore)TNECore.instance();
059  }
060
061  @Override
062  public void registerMenuHandler() {
063
064    this.menuHandler = new BukkitMenuHandler(plugin, true);
065  }
066
067  @Override
068  public void registerCommandHandler() {
069
070    //Lamp.Builder<? extends CommandActor> builder = BukkitLamp.builder(plugin).accept(registerParameters());
071    //TODO: Load module parameter types
072
073    command = BukkitLamp.builder(plugin).accept(registerParameters()).build();
074  }
075
076  @Override
077  public String commandHelpWriter(final ExecutableCommand executableCommand, final CommandActor commandActor) {
078
079    return "";
080  }
081
082  @Override
083  public void registerConfigs() {
084
085    super.registerConfigs();
086
087    this.bukkitConfig = new BukkitConfig();
088    if(!this.bukkitConfig.load()) {
089      PluginCore.log().error("Failed to load bukkit configuration!");
090    }
091  }
092
093  @Override
094  public void registerCommands() {
095
096    super.registerCommands();
097
098    //Register our commands
099    command.register(new AdminCommand());
100    command.register(new ShortCommands());
101    command.register(new ModuleCommand());
102    command.register(new MoneyCommand());
103    command.register(new TransactionCommand());
104  }
105
106  @Override
107  public void registerCallbacks(final CallbackManager callbackManager) {
108
109    super.registerCallbacks(callbackManager);
110
111    callbackManager.addConsumer(TNECallbacks.ACCOUNT_TYPES.id(), (callback->{
112
113      if(Bukkit.getPluginManager().getPlugin("Towny") != null) {
114
115        PluginCore.log().debug("Adding Towny Account Types");
116        TownyHandler.addTypes();
117      }
118
119      if(Bukkit.getPluginManager().getPlugin("Factions") != null) {
120
121        PluginCore.log().debug("Adding Factions Account Types");
122        FactionHandler.addTypes();
123      }
124      return false;
125    }));
126  }
127
128  @Override
129  public BukkitItemCalculations itemCalculations() {
130
131    return new BukkitItemCalculations();
132  }
133
134  public JavaPlugin getPlugin() {
135
136    return plugin;
137  }
138}
